title: How to possible fix the DNS/HTTP connection and RAD error!
body: Possible solution that i've only tried to make things work is to change the DNS itself. Go to your taskbar at the bottom, right click your internet icon and go to Network and Sharing Centre, go to Change adapter settings listed on the top left side, right click your wifi or your ethernet and select properties, scroll down if you have to in which there would be a ''Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)'' listed, click that and press properties, select the Use the following DNS server addresses and put in the first as 8.8.8.8 and the next one as 8.8.4.4, now apply the change and go back to your LoL folder and right click your lol.launcher.admin.exe and run it as admin, and that might fix it, if it doesnt fix it, feel free to try the suggestion from the link http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/board/showthread.php?t=1813937
